content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 17 (APP): The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Friday directed the Deputy Commissioner to meet the Nanbai Association by Monday in a case related to prices of arotia and naan in the federal capital. It directed to resolve the issue of the arotia price by Monday. The court extended the order to stop the district administration from any action the naanbais and alsoA ordered the immediate release of two naanbais. During the hearing, President Nanbai Association Sajjad Abbasi and others appeared in the court along withA Barrister Umar Ijaz Gilani. Justice Arbab Muhammad Tahir said, aLetas see if they have been charged with murder.a To this, the lawyerA of the petitioner said, aNo, they have not been charged with murder. The court should order theirA release.a We did not meet the Deputy Commissioner, but the Deputy Director Food. Justice Arbab Muhammad Tahir said, aYou should meet the DCa .Justice Arbab Muhammad Tahir said, aTheA DC should meet the association somewhere by Monday and resolve the matter.a
